ygData.subject: Re: Laptop
ygData.msgSnippet: The Winbook XL2 is a good laptop, that I know will play EQ. I think what you need to look for is the ATI LT RAGE PRO 3d video card. Some laptops have it with
ygData.messageBody:
The Winbook XL2 is a good laptop, that I know will play EQ.

I think what you need to look for is the ATI LT RAGE PRO 3d video card.
Some laptops have it with 4MB memory and some with 8MB memory.

I "believe" any laptop with that card will work.

Travis


-----Original Message-----
From: Shannon Upham [mailto:shannon@...]
Sent: Friday, June 18, 1999 3:48 PM
To: EverQuest@onelist.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Laptop


From: "Shannon Upham" <shannon@...>

Hail,

I am currently in the market for a new laptop. While looking, I decided I
might as well get one that can also play Everquest.

Is there anyone out there who has successfully run EverQuest on a laptop?
Could you please let me know what model?

thank you....

shannon AKA Jugit - Half Elf Warrior / Lucee the Dark Elf Necromancer.
